Streetwise Can You Make Money in a Euro Collapse? In a euro breakup scenario, there are a few ways bond investors can protect against a redenomination into a devalued currency By @jmackin2 Feb. 23, 2017 1:34 p.m. ET 
As Europe is roiled by fears of a breakup of its currency, investors and lawyers have begun digging through bond documentation in the hope of finding ways to protect themselves against the possible return of the franc, lire and deutsche mark. 
The plethora of bonds available offer many ways to bet on the possibility of the end of the euro.
